attributes.action: abolish the plans to increase air passenger duty for regional airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: costs are already prohibitive for flights from regional airports and the plans to increase the duty per person will prevent the majority of families from even considering a holiday or trip abroad. The cost to small businesses could prevent them even considering the venture of exporting.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
